title: LISTEN: The Debate podcast - Ian Wright and Dennis Wise
description: Listen back to the latest edition of The Debate, as Dennis Wise and Ian Wright joined Geoff Shreeves to discuss the big football talking points.
content: The trio looked back at the use of VAR in Chelsea's 0-0 draw with Arsenal in the Carabao Cup semi-final first leg at Stamford Bridge, as well as the Gunners' defiant showing.Also up for discussion was Mesut Ozil's Arsenal future, Liverpool's Super Sunday clash with Manchester City, plus Antonio Conte's future at Chelsea.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
